findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: Future date reference - document cannot contain December 2024 data if written before that date
US typically defines working age as 16-64, not 15-64
Overgeneralization - study findings from specific context presented as universal truth

findings.issue: Future date reference - cannot have closing price for future date
